title: Level 4: ADAS Collision Risk Calculator
description:
You're building an Advanced Driver Assistance System. Calculate the time-to-collision (TTC) given:

Your vehicle speed: 25 m/s
Obstacle distance: 75 meters
Obstacle speed: 10 m/s (same direction)

Formula: TTC = distance / (your_speed - obstacle_speed)

What is the TTC in seconds? (Round to 1 decimal place)
hint: Calculate the relative speed (your speed minus obstacle speed), then divide distance by relative speed. Don't forget to round.
